member.returns: AtomEntry

member.name: M:Google.GData.Spreadsheets.CellFeed.CellUri(System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: returns an update URI for a given row/column combination in general that URI is based on the feeds POST feed plus the cell address in RnCn notation: http://spreadsheets.google.com/feeds/cells/key/worksheetId/private/full/cell
member.returns: string

member.name: M:Google.GData.Spreadsheets.CellFeed.Delete(System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: deletes a cell by using row and column addressing

member.name: M:Google.GData.Spreadsheets.CellFeed.Publish
member.summary: uses GData batch to batchupdate the cell feed. If the returned batch result set contained an error, it will throw a GDataRequestBatchException

member.summary: The number of rows in this cell feed, as a RowCountElement

member.summary: The number of columns in this cell feed, as a ColCountElement

member.name: P:Google.GData.Spreadsheets.CellFeed.Item(System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: returns the given CellEntry object. Note that the getter will go to the server to get CellEntries that are NOT yet on the client
member.returns: CellEntry

member.name: M:Google.Spreadsheets.Application.Refresh
member.summary: this will reload the list of spreadsheets from the server and reset the currently active spreadsheet/worksheet

members.member: Parse a range given as, e.g., A2:D4 into numerical coordinates. The letter indicates the column in use, the number the row

member.name: P:Google.Spreadsheets.Application.Spreadsheets
member.summary: this returns a list of strings, with the names of each spreadsheet this will do a roundtrip to the google servers to retrieve the list of spreadsheets if not done yet
member.returns: List of strings

member.name: P:Google.Spreadsheets.Application.CurrentSpreadsheet
member.summary: this will return the current spreadsheetname that is being worked on, or, if set see if there is a spreadsheet of that name, and if so, make this the current spreadsheet

member.name: P:Google.Spreadsheets.Application.WorkSheets
member.summary: returns a list of Worksheet names for the currently set spreadsheet, or NULL if no spreadsheet was set
member.returns: NULL for no spreadsheet, an empty list for no worksheets in the spreadsheet or a list of names of the worksheets in the current spreadsheet

member.name: P:Google.Spreadsheets.Application.CurrentWorksheet
member.summary: this will return the current worksheetname that is being worked on, or, if set see if there is a worksheet of that name, and if so, make this the current worksheet Note that this requires that a current spreadsheet is set

member.name: P:Google.Spreadsheets.Application.CompleteRange
member.summary: get the whole spreadsheet as a range, one line is one row, one cell is
